titles.title: Low or No Emission Bus Access Act of 2020
Low or No Emission Bus Access Act of 2020
A bill to clarify low or no emission vehicle project eligibility for bus and bus facility competitive grants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

bill.summary:
Low or No Emission Bus Access Act of 2020
This bill revises and extends through FY2025 the low or no emissions competitive grant program for buses and bus facilities.
